channel.title: PALO Framework News
channel.description: Latest updates, tools, and insights from the PALO Framework - Principled AI Lifecycle Orchestration for responsible AI governance.

item.title: üÜï Risk Tiering Calculator - Classify AI Systems per EU AI Act
item.description: New tool released! The Risk Tiering Calculator helps you classify AI use cases into EU AI Act risk tiers (Minimal, Limited, High, Unacceptable) with a simple 3-step wizard. Get instant guidance on required documentation and compliance requirements based on PALO Framework Section 3.3.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework

item.title: üìä KPI Generator - Personalized AI Metrics Dashboard
item.description: Generate personalized Technical, Business, and Ethical KPIs for your AI projects. Based on PALO Framework Table 2, this tool provides 30+ metrics with definitions and measurement guidance. Export to CSV or Markdown for your data science teams.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework

item.title: üõ°Ô∏è FRIA Module - Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment
item.description: The interactive Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment tool is now available. Evaluate AI systems against all 51 EU Charter fundamental rights as required by EU AI Act Article 27. Includes scenario analysis, risk matrix visualization, and comprehensive reporting.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework

item.title: ‚ôø Full Accessibility Compliance Achieved (WCAG 2.1 AA)
item.description: PALO Framework website now fully complies with WCAG 2.1 Level AA, EN 301549 V3.2.1, and European Accessibility Act requirements. All pages include skip links, ARIA landmarks, focus indicators, and reduced motion support.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework

item.title: üé® Model Canvas AI - Visual AI Governance Tool
item.description: The PALO Model Canvas provides a visual framework for AI governance. Document your AI systems across all PALO dimensions including Purpose, Data, Technical, Business, and Ethics. Export to JSON, PNG, or Markdown.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework

item.title: üöÄ PALO Framework Website Launch
item.description: Welcome to the PALO Framework - Principled AI Lifecycle Orchestration. Our comprehensive methodology integrates ISO 42001 standards, OECD AI principles, and the EU AI Act into a unified operational model for responsible AI governance in business.
item.dc:creator: PALO Framework
